fields.name: Erase (Passive):
fields.value: ** Each night, receive a random list of living players based on your score. Choose whether to attack all or none of them. If you choose to attack, the roles of those who die tonight will not be revealed if they scored outside (your score +/- your standard deviation).

fields.name: Read Between The Lines (Passive):
fields.value: Learn the true role and alignment of each player who dies, regardless of any modifiers.
